Package il.ac.hit.CashFlowManagement.model

Interface IUserLogic

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserLogic
public interface IUserLogic
this interface define the operations that the UserLogic must implement

    add user to the Registered_Users table in the DB

  • Method Details

    • checkIfExist

      boolean checkIfExist​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iUserName)
      check if user exist in the Registered_Users table
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the new user username, can't be null
      Returns:
      true either false if the username exists in the DB

    • checkUserPassword

      boolean checkUserPassword​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iUserName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iPassword)
      validate user login information (username and password match) in the Registered_Users table
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the username of the user who want to login, can't be null
      iPassword - the password of the user who want to login, can't be null
      Returns:
      true either false if the login information is correct

    • addUser

      void addUser​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iUserName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iPassword, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iCountry, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String iGander)
      add user to the Registered_Users table in the DB
      Parameters:
      iUserName - the new user username, can't be null
      iPassword - the new user password, can't be null
      iCountry - the new user country, can't be null
      iGander - the new user gander, can't be null
